timeline.message:
Merge pull request #1 from elastic/master

get lastest master code

Merge pull request #2 from elastic/master

lastest code from master
make code more clean by user isempty

Merge pull request #3 from elastic/master

lastest code from master
Merge branches 'master' and 'use_isempty_make_code_clean' of github.com:zhenxianyimeng/elasticsearch into use_isempty_make_code_clean

timeline.bodyText: @rjernst is it an issue that this line of code is referenced in the documentation, due to the tag::search-scroll-example?
timeline.author: pugnascotia

replies.bodyText:
Yes and no. The examples are just that: examples. We don't show the full file, so they already lack anything we include.  However, while CollectionUtils is currently brought in by the HLRC through its server jar dependency, I agree we shouldn't be leaking this method in our docs.
@zhenxianyimeng Can you please revert this and any other *DocumentationIT tests?
replies.author: rjernst
